title: DateValidator
description: A validator specifying the constraints on a date.

type.$comment:
This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.
It is extended with the titles of all descendant types during
the generation of schema.json files.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

minimum.description: The inclusive lower limit for a date.
minimum.$comment: A date is valid if it is greater than, or exactly equal to, `minimum`.

maximum.description: The inclusive upper limit for a date.
maximum.$comment: A date is valid if it is less than, or exactly equal to, `maximum`.
